name: Doc Ironfist
description: A hulking figure, Doc Ironfist is permanently encased in segmented plates of scavenged armor. Wires snake from beneath the armor's surface, connecting to various implants and cybernetic augmentations that define his form.

flavor.rationale: Doc Ironfist operates a discreet medical clinic in the heart of Zenith-9's undercity. He provides treatment for both legal clients and those who seek illicit enhancements, catering to the city's diverse denizens.
